## MentionOnlyStrategy

Reply strategy implementations for Phase B
Each strategy exposes a `shouldReply` function that returns boolean

### Parameters

*   `$0` **[Object][1]**&#x20;

    *   `$0.message` &#x20;
    *   `$0.isMentioned` &#x20;
    *   `$0.replyBehavior` &#x20;

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object
